long_description: Built for the growing young camper, the REI Kindercone kid's sleeping bag keeps your little one warm while enjoying backyard campouts or camping sessions in the woods. Synthetic insulation provides toasty warmth down to about 30degF and continues to insulate even when damp. Attached stuff sack doubles as a space adjuster allowing you to shorten or lengthen the bag as child grows. Mummy bag features a barrel shape that provides generous interior volume for move-around comfort. Ripstop nylon shell fabric has a nice hand feel, and is lightweight, durable, water- and abrasion resistant. Synthetic insulation provides toasty warmth and continues to insulate even when damp. Soft and comfortable polyester taffeta liner features bright, fun graphics. 2-way, antisnag coil zipper; differentiated drawcords (1 round, 1 flat) allow quick identification, even in the dark, so neck and hood adjustments are a cinch. REI Kindercone has a pillow pocket in the hood so kids can stuff extra clothing inside for a comfortable pillow.
short_description: Built for the growing young camper, the REI Kindercone kid's sleeping bag keeps your little one warm while enjoying backyard campouts or camping sessions in the woods.
